Description: DNRB was sentenced for violating an OSHA regulation and causing the death of a Raymore, Mo., ironworker.

NAICS Translation: 238120: Structural Steel and Precast Concrete Contractors
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
